  Materials for the <a href="https://safetygraphics.github.io/">safetyGraphics</a> R Pharma 2021 Workshop
  
  The Interactive Safety Graphics (ISG) subteam of the ASA Biopharm-DIA Safety Working Group is an interdisciplinary effort that, amongst other things, seeks to provide a clinical safety workflow for monitoring during clinical development in an open source model.

## Setup

We'll be using [RStudio Cloud]() for this workshop

## Schedule 


| Time | Activity |
| ---- | -------- |
| 20 min | 🎬 Intro to safetyGraphics |
| 10 min | 📓 Hello World |
| 30 min | 📋 Loading Custom Data |
| 10 min | 📈 Chart/App Export |
| 10 min | ☕ Break |
| 1 hr | 📊 Creating Custom Charts |
| 40 min | ⌨️ Custom Domain |
| 20 min | 🎀 Wrap Up |
